name: part_001
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ1周年記念ライブ】シャチ出没中【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [YOnasn4-BH0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs 'GLAMOROUS SKY' on stage with vibrant lighting and large screen displays.
A transition sequence featuring stylized graphics of a door opening, displaying the text 'Chloe' and 'hololive' against a red background.
Sakamata Chloe performs 'Yowane Haki' with synchronized on-screen lyric graphics and changing background patterns.

subtitles.original: その夢を
subtitles.english: That dream...

subtitles.original: 繋ぎ止めて
subtitles.english: ...hold onto it tight.

subtitles.original: 二人歩こう GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: Let's walk together, GLAMOROUS SKY.

subtitles.original: Hummm... GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: Hummm... GLAMOROUS SKY

subtitles.original: Hummm... GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: Hummm... GLAMOROUS SKY

subtitles.original: 眠れないよ...
subtitles.english: I can't sleep...

subtitles.original: Monday 待って Tuesday 待って
subtitles.english: Wait for Monday, wait for Tuesday.

subtitles.original: Wednesday 行き場のない
subtitles.english: Wednesday, with nowhere to go...

subtitles.original: Friday Saturday
subtitles.english: Friday, Saturday...

subtitles.original: 七色 Every day
subtitles.english: ...seven-colored Every day.

subtitles.original: 闇雲に消える雲
subtitles.english: Clouds disappearing blindly.

subtitles.original: 応えて 僕の声に
subtitles.english: Answer to my voice.

subtitles.original: あの雲を払って
subtitles.english: Clear away those clouds,

subtitles.original: 君の未来照らしたい
subtitles.english: and I want to light up your future.

subtitles.original: この夢を抱えて
subtitles.english: Holding this dream,

subtitles.original: 二人歩こう GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: let's walk together, GLAMOROUS SKY.

subtitles.original: あの虹を渡って
subtitles.english: Crossing that rainbow,

subtitles.original: あの空に帰りたい
subtitles.english: I want to return to that sky.

subtitles.original: あの夢を並べて
subtitles.english: Lining up those dreams,

subtitles.original: 二人歩こう GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: let's walk together, GLAMOROUS SKY.

subtitles.original: GLAMOROUS SKY
subtitles.english: GLAMOROUS SKY

subtitles.original: 裏路地の真ん中で
subtitles.english: In the middle of a back alley,

subtitles.original: 慣れない景色と好かない匂いに
subtitles.english: by unfamiliar sights and smells I dislike,

subtitles.original: 私は覆われて
subtitles.english: I'm being covered,

subtitles.original: 染まっていくんでしょ
subtitles.english: and I'm being dyed, right?

subtitles.original: 私は怖がりで 知らないことには手を付けず
subtitles.english: I'm a coward, and I don't touch things I don't know.

subtitles.original: 誰かがやって来て毒味をするまで待っていた
subtitles.english: I waited until someone came and tasted it for poison.

subtitles.original: すること単純でマニュアル通りの生活を
subtitles.english: Leading a life by the manual with simple things to do,

subtitles.original: 来る日も淡々と過ごしていた
subtitles.english: I spent every day indifferently.

subtitles.original: そういやさ そういやさ 昨日の私もこうだった
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, I was like this yesterday, too.

subtitles.original: そういやさ そういやさ
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, come to think of it.

subtitles.original: 弱い音を吐いている 薄っぺらい人間です
subtitles.english: I'm whining, a shallow person.

subtitles.original: 一歩前に出るのはやめておきます
subtitles.english: I'll refrain from taking a step forward.

subtitles.original: 絡まれたくはないからさ
subtitles.english: Since I don't want to get involved.

subtitles.original: 描いた理想像に
subtitles.english: In the ideal I envisioned,

subtitles.original: 現実味がないから
subtitles.english: there's no sense of reality,

subtitles.original: 近づけないよう生きてきます
subtitles.english: so I'll live without getting close to it.

subtitles.original: 明日も同じよう過ごしときます
subtitles.english: I'll spend tomorrow the same way.

subtitles.original: 路地裏の真ん中で
subtitles.english: In the middle of a back alley,

subtitles.original: いつもの夕日を薄目で眺めて
subtitles.english: looking at the usual sunset with narrowed eyes,

subtitles.original: 胸の内で呟いた「いつもって何時頃だろ」
subtitles.english: I whispered in my heart, 'What time is "usual" anyway?'

subtitles.original: そういやさ そういやさ 昨日の夕飯これだった
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, this was yesterday's dinner, too.

subtitles.original: そういやさ そういやさ
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, come to think of it.

subtitles.original: 臆病で切りが悪い 意気地なし人間です
subtitles.english: Cowardly and indecisive, a spineless person.

subtitles.original: 後ろに下がって逃げときます
subtitles.english: I'll step back and run away.

subtitles.original: 目立ちたくなんかないからさ
subtitles.english: Since I don't want to stand out or anything.

subtitles.original: 描いた理想像に
subtitles.english: In the ideal I envisioned,

subtitles.original: 現実味がないから
subtitles.english: there's no sense of reality,

subtitles.original: 近づけないよう生きてきます
subtitles.english: so I'll live without getting close to it.

subtitles.original: 明日も同じよう過ごしときます
subtitles.english: I'll spend tomorrow the same way.

subtitles.original: 弱い音を吐いている 薄っぺらい人間です
subtitles.english: I'm whining, a shallow person.

subtitles.original: 一歩前に出るのはやめておきます
subtitles.english: I'll refrain from taking a step forward.

subtitles.original: 絡まれたくはないからさ
subtitles.english: Since I don't want to get involved.

subtitles.original: 溜息ばかりさ 刺激足りないの
subtitles.english: Just constant sighs, not enough excitement.

subtitles.original: けどそう上手くいかないけどさ 試しにちゃんと生きてみよう
subtitles.english: But it doesn't go that well, so let's try to live properly for once.
